titleStmt.title: World Wide Diplomatic Archives Index: The Republic of Korea (South Korea)
The Republic of Korea (South Korea)

div.head: Legislation
div.p: The Diplomatic Archives of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade has the authority to open materials more than 30 years old. The Act on Disclosure of Information by Public Agencies which went into effect in January 1998 gives South Korean citizens and foreigners resident in South Korea the right to request access to government records with exceptions for National Security.

div.head: Location
div.p: Ministry of Foreign Affairs: 37 Sejongno (Doryeom-dong), Jongno-gu, Seoul 110-787

div.head: Procedures
div.p: Researchers should contact the Diplomatic Archives Section of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade to check the availability of records.
